attributes.title: terrible app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it said the next day I am going to kill taylor and my friends I got so scared and went to bed when I went to bed I heared  chukle noises and in the morning my pet ant (Petrisha)was dead on the floor and it got more worst like don't ever in your entire life download this app it is suler dangerous

attributes.title: Worst app to ever exsist
attributes.review: This app took almost a year to download and when it did I opened the app and my screen just went pitch black my phone was hacked. Then some Cheeto guy with blonde hair showed up at my house and tried to “take me back to where I belong” I was shook and scared. Do not recommend this APP AT ALL

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER DO NOT BUY!!!!!! 😡🤮💔
attributes.review:
1 took extremely long to download 2 was VERY slow 3 crashed multiple times 4 asked for VERY inappropriate and unnecessary information
overall i am EXTREMELY UNSATISFIED and therefore advise everyone to #settleforbiden2020 because he would never give us this bad quality of an app!!!!

attributes.title: worst app
attributes.review: hands down, the worst app i have ever downloaded. only seconds after it finished downloading, which in itself took about two days, my phone turned off by itself and wouldn't turn back on. when i turned it on, everything was gone from it and i hadn't recently backed my phone up so now so many memories are gone :( this is extremely upsetting to me and i would advise that nobody else downloads this app and that every bad rating on this app is accurate.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: After waiting 10 weeks for the app to download, I opened it excited to finally use it and all I got was a bunch of spam emails that completely froze up my phone and used up all my storage. Would NOT recommend.

attributes.title: I advise against getting this app!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my dear leader trumpkin 🧚🏽‍♂️ because he is so great ya know, but it wont work, it keeps just sending me these emojis ❄️🧚🏽‍♂️❄️🧚🏽‍♂️❄️🧚🏽‍♂️❄️ im not sure why, also, i got trump rally tickets!!! But sadly i have to walk my fish that day🥺 guess i cant support my favorite orange 🍊 😍😍😍🤩🤩luv you trumpkin 😍💫❄️❄️❄️❄️❄️

attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!! DONT GET!!!
attributes.review: this app was haunting me in my nightmare bc of all the horrible things it said to me. for starters when i got the app it said “vote for trump or else” and then all the yelling at me gg right the phone for me to jump off a bridge. it even said “i will lock ur ppl up in a basement if u don’t comply”. 0/10 do not recommend 😒

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: If I could go lower than a star, believe me I would. I don’t know where to begin with this app, it was terrible.  For starters they put this orange Cheeto on my screen along with the America flag as if it’s trying to symbolize that the two things correlate. They do not. It was awful. I hate it here.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE!! i absolutely hate it. the app took 5 weeks to download and when it did my phone crashed. i downloaded to keep track and it deleted everything off my phone after making my phone continuously glitch. terrible app don’t download!

attributes.title: Bad App!
attributes.review: This app was terrible! All it did was talk about his campaign and how he can make more money. I would like to see the app filled with more patriotic pictures and talk about the success in the country and in the  world. App was also slow and buttons were to small.:(
